item.description:
HELLO AGAIN,

I HAVE NARROW THE LOCATION TO ALLSTON. ( I WAS LEANING TOWARD SOHO BUT THE PARKING MAY BE DIFFICULT) SINCE THE EVENT IS SPORTS RELATED LETS MEET AT THE SPORTS DEPOT IN ALLSTON!

HOPE ALL CAN MAKE IT ANYTIME AFTER 6PM I'LL BE THERE

THERE IS PARKING AND ITS LOCATED NOT FAR FROM THE T
WEB SITE WWW.SPORTSDEPOTBOSTON.COM
HOPE TO ADD LINKS FOR DIRECTIONS

CASUAL GATHERING AFTERWORK FOR APPETIZERS/DRINKS/DINNER AND HOPEFULLY LOTS TO DISCUSS REGARDING TENNIS PLANS

LOOK FORWARD TO MEETING ALL MEMBERS IF ANY QUESTIONS OR CONCERNS PLEASE FEEL FREE TO CONTACT ME ( LAF620@RCN.COM )

SEE YOU THERE
TAKE CARE
LARA / LAURA

Hello everyone !

WOW what a response !! THANKS to all for replying Can't wait to meet everyone and start playing tennis !!

Due to the large response and several members unable to attend Wednesday I am Looking into changing the scheduled date to meet up to Tuesday MARCH 20TH ANYTIME AFTER 6:30 PM
Casual afterwork gathering on the first day of Spring ?

If you have any input please feel free to contact me I want to allow everyone to meet and have the opportunity to discuss tennis plans!

Also I am trying to find a location central to all the replies. ( Allston Arlington Bedford Boston Cambridge Medford Malden Somerville etc) that will accommodate all of us and hopefully plenty of parking!! Of course accessible to the T as well.

I am leaning toward Cambridge / Brighten ( restaurant) location to meet up with everyone and discuss tennis teams and convenient times for players to schedule court time.

I will Post a specific location within the next week .
If anyone has any suggestions or additional input please again feel free to contact me

LOOK forward to meeting everyone real soon
item.name: The Somerville Tennis March Meetup
